Question
========

What is TRUE regarding the relationship between the standard error of a regression parameter on the one hand and $N$ and $s_{x}$ on the other hand?

The standard error is smallest for

  
Answerlist
----------
* Large $N$ and low $s_{x}$.
* Large $N$ and high $s_{x}$.
* Small $N$ and low $s_{x}$.
* Small $N$ and high $s_{x}$.


Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
